Package.Name: Hangar
Package.Description: Customize your hangar!

Package.Name: Hangar FreeCamera by Goofy67 v{version}
Package.Description:
Nice add-on for HangMan (not mandatory) and usefull for screenshots, as the GUI is completely disabled.

Left-Shift + F3: enabe/disable freecam
W, A, S, D: Move Camera
E, Q: Move camera up and down
P: smooth camera movements (inertia)
and much more, see included XML-file.

Package.Name: Hangar Manager (HangMan) v{version}
Package.Description:
Hello friends!
I want you to meet my HangarManager "HangMan".

Features:

Creating your own hangar during a battle by saving the map and tank position
Possibility to make separate sound settings for each hangar
Change the hangar by:
selector-window or by pressing keys on keyboard 
random (on login and after battle)
depending on nation of selected vehicle
last known position on map of last battle 
Automatic reading of all installed hangars (with exclusion list)
settings-window for keyboard-settings
preview-images installabe (new since 2.2)
Package.UpdateComment:
Version 2.29.1:
- fixed bug in combination with battlehits 

Version 2.28.1:
- regained cap-circles-removement
- some fixes
- added preview-picture for remembrance-day-hangar
- left-CTRL + left-click on HangMan-button in lobby reloads hangar; if you are a tank-preview, client switches back and reloads tank (with selected modules), little help for skinners

Version 2.28:
- adapted for 1.2.0
- disabling cap-circles does not work (would cause a crash-to-desktop), function disabled (although still in config)

Version 2.27:
- adapted for 1.1.0
- some bug-fixes

Version 2.26.2:
- added preview-pictures for new hangars in 1.0.2.4
- fixed issue where camera moved to max. distance after returning from customization-room

Version 2.26.1:
- bug-fix: when showing a tank in vehicle-preview, the camouflage from selected tank in garage was displayed on this tank

Version 2.26:
- improved 'move hangar-vehicle window":
	- accessible via middle-mousebutton-click on HangMan-button and/or added "move"-button in main HangMan-window
	- textfields for coordinates etc. are editable now
	- added buttons to reset values, save hangar and cancel process
- language-files are no longer created on runtime, all (?) available languages included (moved to separate folder, proper translations still welcome)
- some bug-fixes
Updating config (at least language-folder) is needed.

Update 2.25:

- adapted for 1.0.2
- added option to remove the 'please-buy-me-tank' in hangar
- fixed not working 'nation'-mode
- added some more hangars; config changed so 'nation'-mode makes more sense now
- removed Buffon from non-event-hangars (sorry Gianluigi, I like you anyway)
- moved text in 'move-hangar-vehicle'-mode into new draggable window
- some localisations are made during runtime by 'https://tech.yandex.com/translate/', might contain errors
- code-redesign
Please delete/update your existing config.

Update 2.24.2:
- fixed a bug which could prevent a proper start into battle (under certain circumstances)

V2.24: FIXES removing GUI on camera-movements & not-visible cap-circles under certain circumstances
- added: change vehicle-position and -orientation in hangar by pressing LALT + F12, changeable in settings-window and save this as new hangar.

2018-04-08: cap circles will be shown in any case (deactivated experimental HangMan function)
Version 2.21.1:
- regained camouflage-functionality (no winter-camo in desert-hangars etc.)
